1558459108_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnX.body:
the issue is not the freedom of the internet, the issue was the manipulation of information performed by social media platforms that can decide what users are going to see, and can give third party companies access to big data collections that can be used to determine what hot words to use to change people's mind. cambridge analitica was just the head of the iceberg, and you can't manipulate opinions without centralizing online users activities and without having access to such data.

TL;DR the problem here has never been freedom of the internet, and internet control is not a solution

1528234320_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnX.body:
the best alternative at the moment is represented by the opennic project
https://www.opennic.org
